name: Tesla Model S
intro: An electric sedan with impressive performance and cutting-edge technology.
details: The Tesla Model S is known for its long range, fast acceleration, and innovative features. It offers a range of over 400 miles and can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in under 2 seconds.

name: BMW i8
intro: A plug-in hybrid sports car with striking looks and innovative technology.
details: The BMW i8 combines the performance of a sports car with the efficiency of a plug-in hybrid. It features a futuristic design and offers an exhilarating driving experience.

name: Ford Mustang GT
intro: An iconic American muscle car known for its powerful performance and classic design.
details: The Ford Mustang GT is equipped with a potent V8 engine that delivers thrilling acceleration and an exhilarating driving experience. With its timeless design and legendary status.

name: Bugatti Chiron
intro: A hypercar that pushes the boundaries of automotive engineering with unmatched speed and luxury.
details: The Bugatti Chiron epitomizes automotive excellence with its quad-turbocharged W16 engine, propelling it from 0 to 60 mph in under 2.5 seconds and reaching over 260 mph.
